column3: Latest;Ratanakiri:------Â A man mistakenly drank acid which was in a water bottle ------at 6:20 pm on December 21
column7: Ratanakiri Province.------The victim was identified as 27-year-old Chau Zhek
column8: an ethnic Jarai resident of the village.------Before the incident
column9: the victim had been drinking beer with neighbours. When he returned home thirsty
column10: he reached for a bottle of water
column11: and after drinking  realized that the bottle contained acid. The family immediately sent the victim to the local health center for help
column12: but his condition was too serious and he was sent to the district health center for further treatment.------POST NEWS
